title: Indiana Congressman Jim Baird hospitalized after car crash
shortDescription: Baird, who represents Indiana's 4th Congressional District, is reportedly in a stable condition.

title: See Republican Congressman Doug LaMalfa's career in politics
shortDescription: Republican U.S. Rep. Doug LaMalfa of California has died, lawmakers confirmed on Jan. 6, 2026.

title: U.S. lawmakers look into bill banning Congress from stock trading
shortDescription: Reports say the Restore Trust in Congress Act combines previous attempts to ban congressional leaders from stock trading.

title: Republican Congressman Doug LaMalfa dies
shortDescription: California Rep. Doug LaMalfa, a dedicated advocate for rural communities and beloved family man, died at 65 as confirmed by Republican lawmakers.

title: California Republican congressman dies at 65
shortDescription: Rep. Doug LaMalfa of California has died, lawmakers confirmed on Jan. 6. His death narrows the GOP's House majority to 218-213.

title: Conway for Congress? Trump foe announces bid for House seat
shortDescription: George Conway, a long-time critic of Donald Trump, is now running in what will be a closely-watched Democratic primary in New York's 12th district.

title: Photos: Jan. 6 Capitol riot, 5 years on
shortDescription: Five years ago, as lawmakers met to certify the results of the 2020 presidential election, thousands of Americans violently stormed the Capitol.

title: Should Trump, Congress update US nuclear strategy? We asked experts.
shortDescription: USA TODAY asked experts what changes our leaders can make to nuclear missile modernization to make the country a safer place.

title: Trump says oil companies could be 'reimbursed' for Venezuela spending
shortDescription: Trump told NBC in the Jan. 5 interview that the U.S. is not at war with Venezuela.

title: 'He's a good guy,' Trump says of Elon Musk after their Florida dinner
shortDescription: Elon Musk posted on social media that he had dinner with President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump at Mar-a-Lago as the men patched their feud
